review_blob: Very balanced and well done IIPA. A brew that you can truly appreciate. Bitterness is there but does not smack you around. Could drink a few!
Pineapple just comes through. Would prefer a little stronger. The IPA seems a little less IPAish than the typical Ballast brew, if that makes sense.
I do not get any ginger aroma or flavor. But the overall IPA base is solid.
beer_name: Ballast Point Big Eye IPA - Ginger

review_blob: Good malt flavor. Great coloring. No aroma but still a solid Amber. Poured a little flat.
The Booth Stout is an outstanding Stout. Chocolate, roasty and smooth for an imperial style. One of the few you can drink multiple in a single setting.
This pale ale is the real deal. Flavour is clean and citrusy. Very crisp. Aroma is outstanding. Citrus fruity bomb. Appearance is on point with a white thick head. Carb level is perfect for style.
